trends: There has been one other sighting in Mt Vernon
There were no other sightings in Mt Vernon on or around March 12th 2010
divs: sighting detailshey,it doesn't fly fast and it makes no noise.the thing is it very different from anything i have ever seen.it floats through the sky and disappear.but right before it disappears it gets really bright,i have seen it twice. thanks [cms\tg\pid]
